roleset.name: move randomly across some scale
roleset.note: RANGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'range' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry meander-47.7, Framenet entry Scalar position 1. Comparison with fluctuate. Treebank has a fondness for coordinating the from and to phrases intoa single PP. (from range.01-v)

example.name: most typical usage
example.text: Initial cost estimates for the plant, which was to have been built in phases, ranged from $1 billion to $1.2 billion.
example.arg: Initial cost estimates for the plant , which was to have been built in phases ,

example.name: manner and medium
example.text: John's grades ranged wildly across the scale.
Received fresh labeled "bowel mucosa" are four fragments ranging in size from 2.0 cm to 2.3 cm in greatest dimension
